10

Chief Judge Mark Wolf will retire from full-time duties

US District Court Chief Judge Mark L. Wolf, who has presided over several high-profile Massachusetts cases in recent years, will retire from full-time status after 27 years on the bench. (Globe, 9:38 a.m.)

Suspected johns ID'd in Zumba sex case

Kennebunk, Maine police released the first round of names of people they say paid for sex with a Zumba fitness instructor charged with prostitution. (AP)
